name: Chicken Attack!
description:
Who even likes chickens?

Find the best skill combo to murder the attacking chickens!

Pick two abilities and fight the chickens.

Game ends once you kill 25 chickens.

Controls

Movement - WASD

Aim - Mouse

Ability 1 - Left Mouse Button

Ability 2 - Right Mouse Button

Reset - R

Created By

https://twitter.com/PatSeeley7

Songs from

- FoolBoyMedia

- Gun Godz OST
